short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically clicks on the twitch claim button. The clicks are shown under chat and are stored in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You are annoyed by the twitch claim button popping up under chat? You want just relax, but redeem your loyalty points at the same time? This extension automatically does it for you by automatically clicking on the the twitch claim button, so that you can just watch your favorite stream.


You can watch multiple stream at the same time, the script is executed separately for each page.

At the moment the number of claimed buttons is only shown, if the streamer is live.
